document_data.name: House of the High One Ascendant
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the High One Ascendant''' was a temple devoted to [[Azuth]] located in the [[Lhairghal Mountains]] near [[Lhair]] in western [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Description: The temple was massive. Existing caverns within the mountains were used as the heart of the temple, with the front facade being constructed with a mighty stone archway and portico. The front of the temple was created with artistic use of the ''[[stone shape]]'' [[spell]] and master sculptors.
document_data.Inhabitants: First [[Arleenaya Kithmaer]] ran the House of the High One Ascendant.
